meanings.sent1: My grandparents senesce gracefully, with wisdom and grace.
meanings.sent2: As time passes, we all senesce and experience the changes that come with aging.
meanings.sent3: The old tree seemed to senesce like a fine wine, becoming more valuable with each passing year.
meanings.sent4: The ancient ruins senesce in the embrace of nature, slowly returning to the earth.
meanings.sent5: The fading sunset seemed to senesce into the horizon, painting the sky with hues of orange and pink.

meanings.definition: To undergo the process of aging.
meanings.sent1: Plants senesce as they reach the end of their life cycle, preparing for new growth.
meanings.sent2: Animals senesce differently depending on their species and environment.
meanings.sent3: The old clock seemed to senesce, its ticking slowing down with each passing year.
meanings.sent4: The city streets senesce at night, quiet and empty under the moonlight.
meanings.sent5: The memories of childhood senesce in our minds, becoming more precious as time goes by.
